intervention_catalogue.name: Dependency and Recovery
intervention_catalogue.short_description: provides support to individuals within the community to address addictions.
intervention_catalogue.long_description:
The D&R service provides support to individuals within the community to address addictions. The service offers the following interventions and programmes:
 - Relapse prevention
 - Interventions for alcohol
 - Chemsex screening, interventions and pathways
 - Programmes aimed at those who use cannabis and other psychoactive drugs.
